//   SpotDirection                c15      1

//   PixelTextureCube_0           s3       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c3, 0.899999976, 1.5, 2, -1
    def c6, 2.5, 3.5, -9.99999997e-007, 1.20000005
    def c7, 0, 15, 0, 0
    dcl_color v0.xyz
    dcl_color1 v1
    dcl_texcoord v2.xy
    dcl_texcoord4_pp v3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 v4.xyz
    dcl_texcoord6 v5.xyz
    dcl_texcoord7 v6.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_cube s3

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15

// Unreal Engine SceneColorTexture halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --fix-unreal-halo-sct --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 CRC32_77CD52D5_1142.txt
mov r30.xyw, v6
texldl r31, c220.z, s15
add r31.w, r30.w, -r31.y
mad r30.x, r31.w, r31.x, r30.x

    dp3 r0.x, v4, v4
    rsq r0.y, r0.x
    mul r0.yzw, r0.y, v4.xxyz
    dp3 r0.y, r0.yzww, -c15
    add r0.y, r0.y, -c16.x
    mul_sat r0.y, r0.y, c16.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, r0.y
    add r0.z, -r0.x, -c3.w
    mov_sat r0.x, r0.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, -c3.w
    pow r1.x, r0.x, c14.w
    mul r2, r0.y, r0.z
    mov r3, r2
    texkill r3
    mov r3.xyw, c3
    mad r0.xz, v2.xyyw, r3.xyyw, c9.xyyw
    texld r4, r0.xzzw, s1
    mad r0.xzw, r4.xyyz, c3.z, c3.w
    mul r1.yzw, r0.xxzw, c12.y
    mov r2.xy, c6
    mad r2.xy, v2, r2, c10
    texld r4, r2, s2
    mad r2.xyz, r4, c3.z, c3.w
    mul r3.xyz, r2, c12.y
    mul r0.xzw, r0, r3.xyyz
    mad r1.yzw, r2.xxyz, r1, -r0.xxzw
    dp3 r2.x, v5, v5
    rsq r2.x, r2.x
    mad r2.y, v5.z, -r2.x, -c3.w
    mul r3.xyz, r2.x, v5
    cmp r2.x, r3.z, r2_abs.y, -c3.w
    add r2.y, r2.x, c6.z
    pow r4.x, r2.x, c6.w
    cmp r2.x, r2.y, r4.x, c7.x
    add r2.y, r2.x, c6.z
    pow r4.x, r2.x, c12.z
    cmp r2.x, r2.y, r4.x, c7.x
    mad r0.xzw, r2.x, r1.yyzw, r0
    mul_pp r0.xzw, r0, c8.xyyz
    nrm_pp r4.xyz, r0.xzww
    dp3 r0.x, r4, r3
    mul r0.xzw, r0.x, r4.xyyz
    mad r0.xzw, r0, c3.z, -r3.xyyz
    nrm_pp r3.xyz, v1
    nrm_pp r5.xyz, v0
    mul_pp r1.yzw, r3.xzxy, r5.xyzx
    mad_pp r1.yzw, r3.xyzx, r5.xzxy, -r1
    dp3 r3.z, r3, r0.xzww
    dp3 r3.x, r5, r0.xzww
    mul r1.yzw, r1, v1.w
    dp3 r3.y, r1.yzww, r0.xzww
    texld r5, r3, s3
    mul r1.yzw, r2.x, r5.xxyz
    add_sat r2.x, r2.x, c13.x
    mov r4.w, c12.w
    mad r1.yzw, r4.w, r1, c11.xxyz
    add r3.xyz, -r3.w, -c0
    mul_pp r1.yzw, r1, r3.xxyz
    mad_pp r1.yzw, r1, c4.w, c4.xxyz
    nrm_pp r3.xyz, v3
    dp3_sat_pp r0.x, r0.xzww, r3
    dp3_sat_pp r0.z, r4, r3
    pow_pp r2.y, r0.x, c7.y
    add r0.x, r0.x, c6.z
    mul_pp r3.xyz, r2.y, c5
    cmp_pp r3.xyz, r0.x, r3, c7.x
    add r0.x, r0.z, c6.z
    cmp_pp r0.x, r0.x, r0.z, c7.x
    mad_pp r0.xzw, r1.yyzw, r0.x, r3.xyyz
    mul r0.xzw, r0, c14.xyyz
    mul r0.xzw, r1.x, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r0.y, r0.xzww
    rcp r1.x, r30.w
    mul r1.xy, r1.x, r30
    mad r1.xy, r1, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r1.zw, c7.x
    texldl r1, r1, s0
    add r1.x, -r3.w, -c2.y
    add r1.x, -r1.x, r1.w
    rcp r1.x, r1.x
    mad r1.x, -c2.x, r1.x, -r30.w
    rcp r1.y, c13.y
    mul_sat r1.x, r1.y, r1.x
    mul r0.w, r1.x, r2.x
    cmp oC0, -r2.w, c7.x, r0
